snippet: Daniel Levitt Jr. complained of trouble breathing after he fled on a scooter and on foot, the police said, and collapsed moments after he was administered an asthma inhaler.
abstract: Queens man Daniel Levitt Jr dies in police custody after fleeing a pair of plainclothes police officers; Levitt complained of trouble breathing immediately after the chase, but died despite efforts by police to administer asthma inhaler that they found in his pocket.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Daniel Levitt Jr. complained of trouble breathing after he fled on a scooter and on foot, the police said, and collapsed moments after he was administered an asthma inhaler.

headline.main: Queens Man Dies After Police Pursue and Then Detain Him
headline.print_headline: Queens Man Dies After Police Pursue and Then Detain Him
